title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Foundational Palliative Care Competency Program for the General Public

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core palliative care principles (pain management, decision-making support, etc.) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners practice effective communication skills (empathic listening, information delivery) with patients and families through role-play simulations at least three times.
Learners acquire basic competency to conduct palliative care consultations in remote settings using digital tools (e.g., video conferencing systems).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
